events.name: curAdvLayout
events.comment: the current adventure layout the player is on

events.title: SYSTEM
events.description: Events related to system settings, UI and misc  background events.

events.title: LAYOUT START
events.description: Events that run during the start of the layout, under (almost) all circumstances.

children.title: Enemy Flags
children.description: Flags that signal to destroy defeated enemies.

children.title: Unlockables
children.description:
windows, Buttons and other objects that unlock
under certain conditions at the layout start

events.title: NEW GAME START
events.description: Events that run at the start of a new game.

events.title: MOVEMENT
events.description:
Events related to moving the player to new
areas and its UI.

children.title: Move Right
children.description: Where to go when "right" button is pressed

actions.text: Go to layout implied in a "right" direction based on current layout.

children.title: Move Left
children.description: Where to go when "left" button is pressed

actions.text: Go to layout implied in a "left" direction based on current layout.

children.title: Move Up
children.description: Where to go when "up" button is pressed

actions.text: Go to layout implied in an "up" direction based on current layout.

children.title: Move Down
children.description: Where to go when "down" button is pressed

actions.text: Go to layout implied in an "down" direction based on current layout.

events.title: ACTIONS
events.description: Events related to action events the player can do and its UI.

children.title: New Game Answers
children.description: Answers the player may choose when answering "New Game Questions" function events (refer to FUNCTIONS LIST > New Game Questions )

actions.text: go to Question 2(day of the week question) when answer button is clicked
go to Question 3(Weather question) when answer button is clicked
Create character with total score and give control to player when answer button is clicked

children.title: Pick Up
children.description: Events related to picking up objects

events.description: Various functions to call and use

children.title: PlayerHud
children.description: Everything related to the player hud

events.title: Objects
